backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, incidents, evidence, stalker profiles, police departments, and settings, using access control and blob storage mixins. Implements create/read operations for user data and incident reporting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature description specifying a splash message string change and the affected frontend file with metadata for components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and workflow roles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata, mounting the root element, and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app that manages authentication state, post-login splash logic, profile setup flow, and renders either the authenticated app or HomePage.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostLoginSp: Displays a post-login splash with a random message and media, optionally using a user-uploaded motivational video before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their profile name before proceeding into the app.
Top-level layout providing header, authentication controls, settings access, content container, and footer for the entire app.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: A settings dialog that loads, edits, and saves user settings and uploads an optional motivational video.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, loading stored identity and handling login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, incidents, stalker profiles, evidence, police data, and user settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables for default, dark, and women’s safety themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AuthenticatedApp.tsx: Main authenticated UI with tab navigation and dynamic theme application based on user settings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with login handling, CTA regression checks, and navigation to incidents.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceReco: Drawer showing detailed evidence info with preview, metadata, and download link.
Page for uploading new evidence, listing existing items, and viewing evidence details.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceSumm: Dialog generating and displaying a text summary of multiple evidence records with copy/download options.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentDeta: Drawer showing incident details, status, report number copy, and evidence count.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsPag: Incident reporting dashboard with search, creation form, list view, and summary panel.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsSum: Displays a dialog showing a generated incident summary with options to copy or download it.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/InstallGuide: Provides installation instructions for iOS, Android, and desktop browsers to add the app to a home screen.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/MessageGener: Generates customizable cease‑and‑desist messages based on tone and optional incident selection, with copy and SMS actions.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/PoliceDepart: Lets users view, search, and save police departments and submit police reports, including a manual add form.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/ResourcesPag: Lists national victim‑support hotlines and resource organizations with phone numbers and website links.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/StalkerProfi: Displays saved stalker profiles and provides a form to create new profiles with descriptive details.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/SubmitPolice: Dialog component that lets users select a police department and generate, copy, or download a combined incidents‑and‑evidence report.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/VictimSurviv: Page for viewing, editing, saving, and clearing optional victim/survivor personal information stored on‑chain.
frontend/src/utils/datetime.ts: Utility functions to format bigint timestamps into readable date/time strings for UI use.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides a helper to trigger browser downloads of plain text files via Blob and temporary links.
frontend/src/utils/files.ts: File validation and conversion utilities for checking size limits, MP4 rules, and reading files into Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/generateEvidenceSumma: Builds a text evidence summary report with tone-specific headers, overviews, timelines, and closings.
frontend/src/utils/googleSearch.ts: Opens a Google search in a new tab using city, state, and query parameters.
frontend/src/utils/incidentSummary.ts: Generates a detailed incident summary report with timeline, stats, and basic keyword pattern analysis.
frontend/src/utils/incidentText.ts: Creates a short formatted incident reference string including title, report number, and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/landingCtaRegressionC: Development tool that checks whether a CTA element is clickable and logs or throws when overlays block pointer events.
frontend/src/utils/messageGenerator.ts: Generates cease‑and‑desist style messages with varying tones and optional incident references.
frontend/src/utils/policeDeptSaveRegress: Development check that warns if a saved police department is missing from the refreshed list.
frontend/src/utils/policeReport.ts: Builds a formatted police report combining incident summaries, evidence summaries, and optional department details.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginSplashImages: Provides a pool of fallback mugshot-style images and returns a random one.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginSplashMessag: Stores fixed intense accountability messages and returns one at random.
frontend/src/utils/smsLink.ts: Creates an SMS link with optional recipient and warns for very long messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, and components with plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, issues, and configuration for the Time4jail project.
